function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through the use of shared sensing network and iot devices in the hospital environment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High environmental contamination in icu compared to gw","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of physical barriers such as plexiglass, polycarbonate, and tempered glass in various industries and healthcare centers.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to green spaces and outdoor environments in housing designs.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher sars-cov-2 rna copy number in solid-phase reservoir of wastewater samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transport-related greenhouse gas emissions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to water source in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evidence that temperature modulates influenza virus survival independent of humidity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial differences between returning residents and visitors in community membership.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Announcement of coronavirus outbreak as a public health emergency of international concern","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher air exchange rate may lead to decreased risk of virus transmission and infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Laboratory testing during the early phase of the epidemic was critical","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal signs conveying regret, gratitude, and well-wishes may lead to increased foot traffic and close interactions, posing a risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of replacing steel surfaces with copper bulk parts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct access to real-time epidemiological data can lead to misinformation and panic if the data is not accurate or properly interpreted.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between nonmetropolitan counties and covid-19 mortality","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardization in metagenomics protocols","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coupling of environmentally efficient vehicles and technical solutions may lead to increased urban mobility and transportation activities, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intermixing of public realms, social spaces, and green infrastructure","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International interdependencies and vulnerabilities in value chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human-building interactions and spatial organization","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in construction industry due to lack of preventive measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of investigation into the impact of housing policies on green housing and resident wellbeing during covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforced confinement leading to 7 million unintended births in poorest countries","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to outdoor green features and natural light.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on commercial and artisanal spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate information on social media","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on foreign demand and value-added in production leading to exposure to foreign shocks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Persistent high covid-19 case numbers despite vaccination programs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Confinement conditions and perception change","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in air change rate due to window-opening behavior leading to variability in indoor air quality.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on an expert system for early detection of covid-19 may lead to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment, increasing the risk of disease transmission within the community.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Highly contagious virus with rapid global spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation, pest infestations, and mold linked to respiratory conditions and poor risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overnight change to the physical and social servicescape in response to the containment measures and consumers’ fear of contamination.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preexisting immunities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus deposits on items and clothing from external spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of socioeconomic factors risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant increase in investments in large firms by equity funds and corporate money market funds during turbulent periods may create concentration risk and communities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
